rows.label: tev019201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara what he thinks about you.

rows.label: tev019201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara about the Prone.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Lara Mara for his thoughts
on the xenoforms in New LA.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara for his opinions on the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL0081
rows.name:
Ask Lara Mara about how he
fared after the Ganglion attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_SEL1011
rows.name:
Ask Lara Mara for his thoughts on why the
Ganglion are so obsessed with humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara about recent developments.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Lara Mara about recent developments.

rows.label: tev019201_SEL2031
rows.name:
Ask Lara Mara for his thoughts on giving up his
mimeosome and returning to his original body.

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Are you that new crew member that Elma and
Vandham had been searching for, mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Oh, I could tell. You seem so much stronger than those
other BLADEs...plus there's that disoriented look on your
face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0003
rows.name:
They said they found 10 people, but you're the only
one I've ever seen. Iiiiinteresting...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Director General Chausson has an honest and somber
face, but he's a politician first and foremost.
And we know what THAT means, mmm? [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Aw, were you worried about little old me?
You're so sweet! Am I blushing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Since you're such a sweetheart, I've got an important
mission for you—bring me happiness for the rest of
my life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Kidding! Just kidding. Don't get your biorhythms all
in a twist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I WASN'T kidding about wanting to give you an
important mission. There's...something about you.
You're not like all those other BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0017
rows.name:
I saw one! I saw one! I saw one of those terrifying
Prone creature thingies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0018
rows.name:
That mouth looked like it was designed to swallow
human heads whole. Brrrr![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0019
rows.name:
I wonder how those big uglies even know about us
little humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Not that I mind being famous, mind you.
I just don't want to be famous for being delicious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Did you know that when you attack a foe from behind,
it's easier to land a hit and you're more likely to dish
out a particularly vicious strike? Mmm-hmmm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0026
rows.name:
...What's that? You consider striking from behind to be
a mark of cowardice and low character?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0027
rows.name:
My dear, the only chivalrous people on the battlefield
are the dead men.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0028
rows.name:
If you want to survive on this cruel world,
sometimes you have to be a bit of a bastard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0035
rows.name:
I can't say I've liked the looks of most of the xenoforms
we've met so far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0036
rows.name: But those Nopon are so fluffy and adorable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Oh, and that guy who just showed up in Armory Alley
is mind-blowingly hot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0042
rows.name:
I wonder if he has any single friends...
Ah, but speak of the devil![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0043
rows.name:
...Oh? Might you be speaking of us? We have long
suspected ourself to be quite the handsome fellow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0044
rows.name:
In regards to your previous question, alas, the answer
is no. Sadly, we are the only one of our kind.
They truly broke the mole when they made us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0045
rows.name:
Oh, you must have spent many a lonely night out there
by yourself... But I'm sure I can ease that lonely heart
of yours, now that you're here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0046
rows.name:
I wonder if he has any friends? If we're talking cute
xenoforms like him and the Nopon, I'll welcome them
with open arms. Grrrawl![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0051
rows.name:
When I first saw the government's announcement about
the Ma-non living in New LA, I thought they looked all
reptilian and gross.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0052
rows.name:
But I no longer feel that way.
In fact, I'm ashamed I ever did![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0053
rows.name:
Rutantan is giving us one great idea after another.
He's really SUCH a help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0054
rows.name:
And all beauty is subjective, right?
It's what's inside that matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0055
rows.name:
I wish I could get a cool boyfriend who would say
things like that about me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0070
rows.name:
Earlier, I was thinking about how horrible life was.
No matter how much time you spend training yourself,
buying and maintaining weapons, and so on...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0071
rows.name:
death could still come for you in an instant.
And when I realized that, I choked up a little bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0072
rows.name:
And suddenly this little xeno guy—who I'd never seen
pay much attention to anyone—came over and tried to
cheer me up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0073
rows.name: So I've resolved to go on for his sake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG0074
rows.name:
If only he'd have been a wonderful human,
the story could have had a real happy ending.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1001
rows.name:
Why do you think the Ganglion are coming after us
humans like this, mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1002
rows.name:
Do they want the Lifehold for some reason?
Or do they just object to us humans tromping around
this planet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1003
rows.name:
Or maybe they're violently jealous of my grace and
beauty? Wouldn't be the first time that happened...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1004
rows.name:
Oh, come on! That was a joooooke!
Don't stare at me like a crazy person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1010
rows.name:
I feel like the Ganglion are rubbing their technological
superiority in our faces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1011
rows.name: But I'm not discouraged at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1012
rows.name:
After all, now we have Rutantan quickly taking apart
and analyzing all the little gizmos they spent so much
time developing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG1013
rows.name:
Oh, and of course there's you—the one who's smashing
them apart to begin with![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2001
rows.name:
I listened to some of the communication logs you
brought back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2002
rows.name:
Since they were emergency communications,
they were mostly in the speakers' native tongues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2003
rows.name:
I can tell they were speaking Japanese and French,
but I have no idea what they were actually saying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2004
rows.name:
...Hey, wait a minute. I just realized that all those
xenoforms have been speaking English![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2005
rows.name:
Has English become the lingua franca of space already?
Good gracious, that was fast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2010
rows.name:
If we're returning to our old bodies, I want to come
back as the sparkly-eyed, pink-cheeked teenager I
once was![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2011
rows.name:
...At least, that's what I told Rutantan. But he said that
the Ma-non haven't been able to create any sort of
fountain-of-youth potions either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019201_MSG2012
rows.name:
So in THAT case, I want to stay young and beautiful
forever inside this mimeosome.[ST:wait ]
